request: Create demonstrations/02_basic_analysis/07_wavelet_analysis.py following the BaseDemo template with CWT, DWT, IDWT demonstrations
notes: Created comprehensive wavelet analysis demonstration with CWT (Morlet, Mexican hat), DWT (Daubechies db4, db8), and IDWT. Implemented workaround for scipy 1.17+ CWT removal by using PyWavelets directly. Demonstration includes 6 parts: CWT with Morlet wavelet for step change analysis, CWT with Mexican hat for impulse detection, DWT decomposition, IDWT reconstruction, wavelet vs FFT comparison for time-frequency localization, and wavelet family comparison. All validations passing with excellent reconstruction fidelity (<0.1% error). Synthetic signals include step changes, impulses, chirps, and multi-component waveforms. IEEE 1241-2010 compliant. CHANGELOG updated as required.
